Cho.name: Surging Fist
Cho.description: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

Cho.name: Consuming Blaze
Cho.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

Cho.name: Rune Bomb
Cho.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 233 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

Cho.name: Hammer of Twilight
Cho.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

Cho.name: Upheaval
Cho.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

Cho.name: Ogre Hide
Cho.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

1.name: Consuming Fire
1.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

1.name: Fuel for the Flame
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%.  Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

1.name: Calloused Hide
1.description: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

4.name: Uppercut
4.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

4.name: Rollback
4.description: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

4.name: Seared Flesh
4.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

7.name: Power Surge
7.description: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds.

7.name: Firestarter
7.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

7.name: Enraged Regeneration
7.description: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.

10.name: Hammer of Twilight
10.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

10.name: Upheaval
10.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Frenzied Fists
13.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

13.name: Runic Feedback
13.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 seconds per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

13.name: Runed Gauntlet
13.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Surging Dash
16.description: While channeling Surging Fist, Cho is Unstoppable and heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

16.name: Twilight Veil
16.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 200% for 2 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

16.name: Molten Block
16.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

20.name: C'Thun's Gift
20.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
20.description: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: The Will of Cho
20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.
